QuestData.Title: Side Effects May Include Mild Undeath
QuestData.Description: Exposure to this particular "byproduct" is quite nasty.$B$BRapid cell degeneration quickly reduces the subject to a shambling husk incapable of any reason or thought beyond a violent, throbbing hatred for the warmth of life.$B$BAs you might imagine, the local fauna have been affected by the spill. Oh, and most of the crew as well...$B$BAnyway, good luck!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Volatile Bears or Volatile Sailors.
